channel.title: Signing issue?
channel.description:
Problem :
[code] load: class .class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: .class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass0(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: .class [/code]
Before you say anything, I did sign it correctly.. its not hard to find the jarsigner use the certificate etc.. Help would be apreciated, if you honestly believe I signed it wrong feel free to teamviewer it and I can say 'I told you so' when it doesn't change shizzle. It can't execute the main client.class I moved the files around so it could, (in jar form it works) previously it didn't work in jar form due to the where the files were in the folder. Using a modifed Orical-x v2 client.

item.title: Signing issue?
item.dc:creator: @run_moneygod run moneygod
item.description:
@run_moneygod wrote:

i will do it just wait feel free 2 add me on msn tarb@live.co.uk

Read full topic

item.title: Signing issue?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

run moneygod:

guessing its the webclient

Correct.

Gnomez, I already stated that… I know how to read lol.
I messed around with the file so it’d work… I’ve had this problem previously… my previous fixed was continuously signing it and randomly it’d get fixed but there must be something wrong?

Also, the file wouldn’t be able to run as a normal .jar file if it couldn’t find client.class

Read full topic

item.title: Signing issue?
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:1, topic:406589”]Problem :

load: class .class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: .class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass0(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: .class

Before you say anything, I did sign it correctly… its not hard to find the jarsigner use the certificate etc…
Help would be apreciated, if you honestly believe I signed it wrong feel free to teamviewer it and I can say ‘I told you so’ when it doesn’t change shizzle.
It can’t execute the main client.class I moved the files around so it could, (in jar form it works) previously it didn’t work in jar form due to the where the files were in the folder. Using a modifed Orical-x v2 client.[/quote]
ive never jarred a client before but i dont think you actually need the .class extension there

“class .class not found.”
